title: 40,000 Enterprise Licenses Partnership
summary: Consulting partner as primary intelligence partner at scale—40,000 ChatGPT Enterprise licenses with upskilling through daily usage before advising clients

content.whatItIs: Accenture is rolling out 40,000 ChatGPT Enterprise licenses and naming OpenAI its primary intelligence partner. This represents one of the largest enterprise AI deployments through a consulting partnership.
howItWorks: Partnership model: OpenAI partners with Accenture to reach enterprises through trusted consulting relationships
Accenture brings change management, implementation, and industry expertise; OpenAI brings model capabilities
40,000 licenses for transforming Accenture's own workforce—'learn by doing' model
Consultants become AI-fluent through daily usage before advising clients
Government extension: UK Ministry of Justice rolled out ChatGPT Enterprise; 'Humphrey' and 'Consult' AI tools for Whitehall
content.coreInsight: For AI platform companies, consulting partnerships (not direct sales) may be the fastest path to enterprise scale. The '40,000 licenses' model combines platform access with implementation expertise and change management. Upskilling the partner's workforce first creates evangelists who then transform client organizations.
content.keyMetrics: OpenAI: 1M business customers ('fastest-growing business platform in history'). Enterprise users save 40-60 minutes/day. 75% of enterprises report positive ROI (Wharton study).
